caption.p: Histological preparations of livers (ematoxylin-eosin staining) of fingerling common carp after feeding experimental diets with graded levels of neroli oil (0â€“1.5%) for 60 days. ( A) Degeneration of hepatocytes (black arrows) and congestion of sinusoids (red arrows) (N 0). ( B) Hydropic degeneration (black arrows) and fat vacuoles in hepatocytes and congestion (red arrow) (NO 0.25). ( C) Degeneration, fat vacuoles in hepatocytes and congestion (NO 0.50). ( D) Hydropic degeneration and steatosis/lipid deposit in hepatocytes (black arrows) (NO 1). ( E) Hepatocytes are hydropic and bubble-like degeneration, steatosis (black arrows) (NO 1.5).
